text: The 3rd IAAF World Indoor Championships in Athletics were held at the Palacio Municipal de Deportes San Pablo in Seville, Spain from March 8 to March 10, 1991. It was the first Indoor Championships to include relay races as well as women's triple jump, albeit as a non-championship event. There were a total number of 518 athletes participated from 80 countries. ==Results== ===Men=== 1987 | 1989 | 1991 | 1993 | 1995 {| |- | |||6.54 |||6.55 |||6.60 |- | |||20.67 |||20.72 |||20.92 |- |
